entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers this afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. High 19. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing near midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023
